# probe_maker
Script that generates probes for enrichment using standard DNA sequences of desired length and overlap.
Based on previous probe makers, it's recommended to pick between 80-120 nt in length. Shorter ones will result in less specific enrichment.
For overlap, it's recommended around 10 nt to ensure no self hybridization.
For example, for an input sequence of   

5'- - 3'

  
and probes of 100 nt with 10 nt overlap, yeilds:
Probe 1: AAGAAAGTATTCCATTCCGGCTCATGGTCCCGGCTAGACCTGCAAGATCGAAGGTACTCAATGACACCAGTGACTGAGCGGTCAGCCCGGAAATAGCCAG  
Probe 2: AAATAGCCAGAAATGTTACCATCCCCGCATGTTACACAAACGTCGGGCTGACGGAACCCATGAGAACCTATGGTGAATAGACAGTAAACGAGCGCAAAGG  
Probe 3: AGCGCAAAGGCGTGCTGCCAAGGGCTCCCACCGAATGTAGAACTGATCTGATTTCCGTGACAGGGAAACGCAATGCGAGGTTCCGCAAGTCCACCTATAA  
Probe 4: CCACCTATAATCTGTGACCGCTCGTAGAACATGGTTAGGGCCTGATTCAGTTAAATCAAGCCACCTCTGACAGAACGACGAGTCAGTGGAATCGACTTCA  
Probe 5: ATCGACTTCACACCTCAGAGTCCACTCACGTGCTGTAAGTCAAAACCCAGTGAACTTCTCAACCGTGTAGCGCTCCTAGAACATTCAGGCGCCACTGAGG  
Probe 6: GCCACTGAGGGGCATATGGATGAAGCGTGATACGAATTACCTCCAACGAATGCCAGCTGGGAGGAGGATAGGGACTATGTCTTCGTCAATGCTCCCGTCA  
Probe 7: GCTCCCGTCAAATGCCTTTCTAAATACCTTTTCGACCTCTCTGTGTGGAATGGGGTCTAGAACCAAGGACTAAAGCGGTGCACGAGGCCCTTTGGATATG  
Probe 8: TTTGGATATGTCCTTCTTGGGAGGGCCCACAGCCAAAGCCACCCATCACAGCTGGAATCTAATCTTGTGACCCAGTATTAACCGTGAGATCTACACAACC  
Probe 9: CTACACAACCGACAAGCGCTAGCTTCCTCCCCGGTCAAGTAGTAATGCCGGGATGACTTTGCGTGTCCTATAGCGATCGAGCCCTCGAATTCACGTCGTC  
Probe 10: TCACGTCGTCAAAGTGGAATGATCAGATTAAAGGGCTGTCGGGAGGGATGTGTAGGCCACTAACACCCCTCTGCACGAACTATAGATACGTCTTTCATCG  
Probe 11: TCTTTCATCGGTACGCTCGAAAGCGCAGGTGGCTCCCAAATCGTGGGGAGTTAATCGAGCTGCGGATTGGTCCCCACGCCTTACGGCAGCGAACATAATC  
Probe 12: GAACATAATCCCGCTGATGTGAAGTCGATCTACAAGGTAAACAACGGGGAATATAATTCAGTTGAACCGGTGTGGAGCCTGCACTTGGAACGCTGCATAA  

Only re library needed to run script. May add a way later to export it in FastA file in future.
